thread.title: Park Won’s Agency Shares How His Collaboration With Suzy Came About
thread.title_full: Park Won’s Agency Shares How His Collaboration With Suzy Came About

author: notclaira
title: Park Won’s Agency Shares How His Collaboration With Suzy Came About
text:
Pin Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
After indie artist Park Won and miss A’s Suzy announced that they were working together on a special release , many fans were curious as to how the collaboration came about. 
Recently Park Won’s agency, MakeUs Entertainment, gave an update on how the two artists met. “Park Won was writing a duet song about the love in a man and woman’s gaze. He wrote it with Suzy’s voice in mind, which he felt was clear in tone and good at conveying the emotion in the lyrics. After he finished writing it, he contacted Suzy directly. Suzy, who is a fan of Park Won’s music, agreed right away.” 
Their duet, “Don’t Wait For Your Love,” will be released on February 28. 
You can watch the teaser below!
